mapper.insert: insert into cart (user_id, cart_img_url, cart_prod_name, count_p, cart_prod_price) values (#{user_id}, #{cart_img_url}, #{cart_prod_name}, #{count_p}, #{cart_prod_price})
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(price*count_p),0) from cart c, product p where c.prod_name=p.prod_name and user_id=#{user_id}
